body:
Can you add friends now? If yes how? 
Thanks - Fused.
body_tagged:
Can you add friends now? If yes how? 
Thanks - Fused.
title: Ummm answer please.

replies.body:
GO on their profile and click add friend.

Accept friend requests in your alerts tab under your profile pic
